sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_2d12eaa5db347a00f59974131f9619a8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getSubmittedRequestData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var jsonArr = [];
	var userId = request.queryParams.userid;
	var desc = request.queryParams.desc;
	var jvar_cat_item_id = "";

	var gr_cat_items = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
        gr_cat_items.addQuery('short_description', desc);
        gr_cat_items.query();
		gr_cat_items.next();
 	jvar_cat_item_id = gr_cat_items.getValue('sys_id');
    
	var gr_requested_items = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
    var gd_requested_items = gr_requested_items.addQuery('request.requested_for', userId);
    var gc_requested_items = gr_requested_items.addQuery('cat_item', jvar_cat_item_id);
    gr_requested_items.addActiveQuery();
    gr_requested_items.orderByDesc('number');
    gr_requested_items.query();
	var projectName = "";
	var name = "";
	
	var gdt = new GlideDateTime(); 
	var year = gdt.getYear();
	
	while (gr_requested_items.next()){
		var number = gr_requested_items.number;
		number = "BROP-"+ year + "-" +number.substring(8);
		var variables = gr_requested_items.variables;
		var stage = gr_requested_items.context.stage.name;
		var submittedDate = gr_requested_items.sys_created_on;
		var sysId = gr_requested_items.sys_id;
		var isFastTrack = gr_requested_items.u_director;
		
		for(key in variables){
			if(variables[key].getGlideObject().getQuestion().getName() == 'projectName'){
				projectName = variables[key].getDisplayValue();
			}
			if(variables[key].getGlideObject().getQuestion().getName() == 'name'){
				name = variables[key].getDisplayValue();
			}
		}
		var orgin_id = gr_requested_items.contact_type;
		if(orgin_id != null && orgin_id.toString().length > 0 && orgin_id.toString() != "Web"){
			    var idVer = orgin_id.toString().split(",");
			    var id = idVer[0];
			    var version = idVer[1];
			    var gr_tracking = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
					gr_tracking.addQuery('u_orgid',id.toString());
					gr_tracking.query();
			        gr_tracking.next();
		        var ticketNum = gr_tracking.u_ticket_number;
			        number = ticketNum + "-" + version;
		}
		jsonArr.push({
			number: number.toString(),
			projectName: projectName,
			name: name,
			stage: stage.toString(),
			submitDate: submittedDate.toString(),
			sysId: sysId.toString(),
			isFastTrack: isFastTrack.toString()
		});
	}
	
	return jsonArr;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/getdata/getSubmittedRequestData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getSubmittedRequestData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-02-07 16:29:15</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>2d12eaa5db347a00f59974131f9619a8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>31</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getSubmittedRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_2d12eaa5db347a00f59974131f9619a8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-01 15:47:06</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GetData">65a592d9dbfc3a00f59974131f961989</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_f9e0890ddb0f62009b0a74131f96192d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getCatItemId</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var jsonArr = [];
	var name = request.queryParams.name;
	
	var gr_cat_items = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
        gr_cat_items.addQuery('short_description', name);
        gr_cat_items.query();
		gr_cat_items.next();
 	var data = gr_cat_items.getValue('sys_id');
	
	jsonArr.push({
			id: data
	});
	
   return jsonArr;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/getdata/getCatItemId</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getCatItemId</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-11-10 20:17:35</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>f9e0890ddb0f62009b0a74131f96192d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getCatItemId</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_f9e0890ddb0f62009b0a74131f96192d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-11-10 20:24:24</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="getData">3689a44a6ff922000a09034abb3ee45d</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_17475ed9dbfc3a00f59974131f9619af
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getDataById</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var jsonArr = [];
    var savedId = request.queryParams.savedId;	
	var gr_saved_items = new GlideRecord('u_dceg_rrs_saved_request');
	gr_saved_items.addQuery("sys_id", savedId);
    gr_saved_items.query();

	gr_saved_items.next();
	var queryStr = gr_saved_items.getValue('u_value');
    var variables = JSON.parse(queryStr);

	jsonArr.push({
		variable: variables
	});
	
   return jsonArr;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/getdata/getDataById</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getDataById</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-02-06 21:03:48</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>17475ed9dbfc3a00f59974131f9619af</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getDataById</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_17475ed9dbfc3a00f59974131f9619af</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-02-06 21:03:48</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GetData">65a592d9dbfc3a00f59974131f961989</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_d29be278db4d3e0054d8ff621f961943
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getRequestDataThroughApproverTable</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var jsonArr = [];
	
	var cat_item_desc = request.queryParams.catDesc;
	var gr_cat_items = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
    gr_cat_items.addQuery('short_description', cat_item_desc);
    gr_cat_items.query();
	gr_cat_items.next();
 	var cat_item_id = gr_cat_items.getValue('sys_id');
	

	var user_id = request.queryParams.userId;
	var type = request.queryParams.type.toString();
	var typeWord = "";
	
	if(type == "init"){
		typeWord = 'Waiting for Executive Secretary Review';
	}else if(type == 'committee'){
		typeWord = 'Waiting for Full Committee to review';
	}else if(type == 'chair'){
		typeWord = 'Waiting for Chair to review';
	}else if(type == 'secretaryFinal'){
		//typeWord = 'Waiting Executive Secretary final review';
		typeWord = 'Waiting for Full Committee to review';
	}else if(type == 'bioinformatician'){
		typeWord = 'In Bioinformatician\'s queue';
	}else if(type =="secreatryTransfer"){
		typeWord = 'Waiting for Secretary transfer review';
	}else if(type == 'bioinformationProgress'){
		typeWord = 'Analysis in Progress';
	}else if (type == 'bioinformationCompleted'){
		typeWord = 'Analysis Completed';
	}else if(type == 'secretaryReviewed'){
		typeWord = 'secretaryReviewed';
	}else if(type == 'committeeReviewed'){
		typeWord = 'committeeReviewed';
	}else if(type == 'chairmanReviewed'){
		typeWord = 'chairmanReviewed';
	}
	
	 var gr_approval_items = GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
     var req_item = gr_approval_items.addJoinQuery('sc_req_item','document_id','sys_id');
     req_item.addCondition('cat_item',cat_item_id);
 
     gr_approval_items.addQuery('approver', user_id);
	 if(type == 'committee'){
		  gr_approval_items.addQuery('wf_activity.stage.name', typeWord);
		  gr_approval_items.addQuery('state', 'NOT IN', 'approved, rejected');
	 }else if(typeWord == 'secretaryReviewed'){
		  var qc = gr_approval_items.addQuery('wf_activity.stage.name', 'Waiting for Executive Secretary Review');
          qc.addOrCondition('wf_activity.stage.name','Waiting for Secretary transfer review');
  	      qc.addOrCondition('wf_activity.stage.name','Waiting for Full Committee to review');
		  var qc1 = gr_approval_items.addQuery('state', 'approved');
		  qc1.addOrCondition('state','rejected');
	 }else if(typeWord == 'committeeReviewed'){
		  gr_approval_items.addQuery('wf_activity.stage.name', 'Waiting for Full Committee to review');
		  var qc2 = gr_approval_items.addQuery('state', 'approved');
		  qc2.addOrCondition('state','rejected');		 
	 }else if(typeWord == 'chairmanReviewed'){
		  gr_approval_items.addQuery('wf_activity.stage.name', 'Waiting for Chair to review');
		  var qc3 = gr_approval_items.addQuery('state', 'approved');
		  qc3.addOrCondition('state','rejected');		 
	 }else{
		 gr_approval_items.addQuery('wf_activity.stage.name', typeWord);
	 }	 
	 gr_approval_items.addQuery('source_table','sc_req_item'); 
     gr_approval_items.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');  
     gr_approval_items.query();
	

	var projectName = "";
	var name = "";	
	var gdt = new GlideDateTime(); 
	var year = gdt.getYear();
	
    while (gr_approval_items.next()){

        var status = gr_approval_items.wf_activity.stage.name;			
        var stage = gr_approval_items.document_id.context.stage.name;
		if(stage.toString() == typeWord || typeWord == 'secretaryReviewed' || typeWord == 'committeeReviewed' || typeWord == 'chairmanReviewed' ){
			//var variables =  gr_approval_items.sysapproval;
			var variables =  gr_approval_items.document_id.variables;
			var number = gr_approval_items.document_id.number;
			number = "BROP-"+ year + "-" +number.substring(8);
			var submittedDate = gr_approval_items.document_id.sys_created_on;
			var submittedBy =  gr_approval_items.document_id.opened_by.getDisplayValue();
			var lastUpdateDate = gr_approval_items.document_id.sys_updated_on;
			var requestId = gr_approval_items.document_id.sys_id;
			var approvalId = gr_approval_items.sys_id;
			var isFastTrack = gr_approval_items.document_id.u_director;
			var estiHour = "";
			if(typeWord == 'Analysis in Progress'){
				var estimateHour = gr_approval_items.document_id.u_computer_decal;
				var hours = estimateHour.split(",");
				estiHour = hours[0].substring('estimate:'.length);
			}
			for(key in variables){
				if(variables[key].getGlideObject().getQuestion().getName() == 'projectName'){
					projectName = variables[key].getDisplayValue();
				}
				if(variables[key].getGlideObject().getQuestion().getName() == 'name'){
					name = variables[key].getDisplayValue();
				}
			}		
			
			var orgin_id = gr_approval_items.document_id.contact_type;
			if(orgin_id != null && orgin_id.toString().length > 0 && orgin_id.toString() != "Web"){
				    var idVer = orgin_id.toString().split(",");
				    var id = idVer[0];
				    var version = idVer[1];
				    var gr_tracking = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
						gr_tracking.addQuery('u_orgid',id.toString());
						gr_tracking.query();
				        gr_tracking.next();
				        var ticketNum = gr_tracking.u_ticket_number;
				        number = ticketNum + "-" + version;
			}
			if(type == 'secretaryFinal' || type == 'committeeReviewed'){
				stage = 'Waiting Executive Secretary final review';
			}

			jsonArr.push({
				number: number.toString(),
				projectName: projectName,
				name: name,
				stage: stage.toString(),
				submitDate: submittedDate.toString(),
				submittedBy: submittedBy.toString(),
				lastUpdateDate: lastUpdateDate.toString(),
				requestId: requestId.toString(),
				approvalId: approvalId.toString(),
				isFastTrack: isFastTrack.toString(),
				estimateHour: estiHour,
				status: status.toString(),
			});
		}	
	}	
	
	
	return jsonArr;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/getdata/getRequestDataThroughApproverTable</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getRequestDataThroughApproverTable</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-02-17 19:32:52</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d29be278db4d3e0054d8ff621f961943</sys_id><sys_mod_count>55</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getRequestDataThroughApproverTable</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_d29be278db4d3e0054d8ff621f961943</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-07 16:56:05</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GetData">65a592d9dbfc3a00f59974131f961989</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>withdrawRequest</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
      var jsonArr = [];
	  var sysId = request.queryParams.sysId;
      var gr = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item')
      gr.addQuery('sys_id',sysId); //to delete one record
      gr.query();
      gr.next();
      gr.deleteRecord();
	
	  jsonArr.push({
		 message: "succeed" 
	  });
	  return jsonArr;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/processdata/withdrawRequest</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/withdrawRequest</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-02-09 15:08:39</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>71d22896dbfc7a0054d8ff621f9619aa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>withdrawRequest</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_71d22896dbfc7a0054d8ff621f9619aa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-02-09 15:36:35</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="ProcessData">6c22654bdbf22200e92cff621f9619d7</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_6af1e123db74fa00f59974131f9619f1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getRequestData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var jsonArr = [];
	var desc = request.queryParams.desc.toString();
	//var desc = "DCEG Resource requisition System - BROP";
    var type = request.queryParams.type.toString();
	//var type = 'init';

	var jvar_cat_item_id = "";
	var typeWord = "";
	
	if(type == "init"){
		typeWord = 'Waiting for Executive Secretary Review';
	}else if(type == 'committee'){
		typeWord = 'Waiting for Full Committee to review';
	}else if(type == 'chair'){
		typeWord = 'Waiting for Chair to review';
	}
	
	
	var gr_cat_items = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
        gr_cat_items.addQuery('short_description', desc);
        gr_cat_items.query();
		gr_cat_items.next();
 	jvar_cat_item_id = gr_cat_items.getValue('sys_id');
    
	var gr_requested_items = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
    var gc_requested_items = gr_requested_items.addQuery('cat_item', jvar_cat_item_id);
    gr_requested_items.addActiveQuery();
    gr_requested_items.orderByDesc('number');
    gr_requested_items.query();
	var projectName = "";
	var name = "";
	
	var gdt = new GlideDateTime(); 
	var year = gdt.getYear();
	
	while (gr_requested_items.next()){
		var stage = gr_requested_items.context.stage.name;
		if(stage.toString() == typeWord){
			var number = gr_requested_items.number;
			number = "BROP-"+ year + "-" +number.substring(8);
			var variables = gr_requested_items.variables;
			stage = gr_requested_items.context.stage.name;
			var submittedDate = gr_requested_items.sys_created_on;
			var submittedBy =  gr_requested_items.opened_by.getDisplayValue();
			var lastUpdateDate = gr_requested_items.sys_updated_on;
			var sysId = gr_requested_items.sys_id;
			var isFastTrack = gr_requested_items.u_director;

			for(key in variables){
				if(variables[key].getGlideObject().getQuestion().getName() == 'projectName'){
					projectName = variables[key].getDisplayValue();
				}
				if(variables[key].getGlideObject().getQuestion().getName() == 'name'){
					name = variables[key].getDisplayValue();
				}
			}
		
			jsonArr.push({
				number: number.toString(),
				projectName: projectName,
				name: name,
				stage: stage.toString(),
				submitDate: submittedDate.toString(),
				submittedBy: submittedBy.toString(),
				lastUpdateDate: lastUpdateDate.toString(),
				sysId: sysId.toString(),
				isFastTrack: isFastTrack.toString()
			});
		}
	}
	
	return jsonArr;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/getdata/getRequestData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getRequestData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-02-13 16:56:46</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>6af1e123db74fa00f59974131f9619f1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>27</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_6af1e123db74fa00f59974131f9619f1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-02-21 20:55:46</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GetData">65a592d9dbfc3a00f59974131f961989</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_15f719d9db43a2009b0a74131f961965
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getVariableArray</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    // this REST api will return all BROP defined item's ID from question tables
	var names = ["name", "requestDate", "projectName", "casCode", "projectId", "trcNumber", "needDate", "requestDescription", "technologyNeed", "whereRun", "otherPlace", "whereStore", "size", "fileFormat", "listDeliverables", "listCollaborators", "imputation", "hpvAnalysis", "matrix", "gwas", "predixan", "ase", "rnaseq", "gwasEnrich", "idsc", "vcf", "pencnv", "gcta", "otherTask", "otherTaskValue"];
    var variables={};
    var email = request.queryParams.email;
	var gr = new GlideRecord("question");
    gr.addQuery("sys_updated_by", email);
    gr.orderBy("order");
    gr.query();

	
	while(gr.next()){
	   var name =  gr.getValue('name');
	   for(var i = 0; i < names.length; i++){
		   if(name == names[i]){
				variables[name] = gr.getValue('sys_id');
				break;
		   }
	   }
	}
	var jsonArr = [];
	jsonArr.push({
		itemId: variables
	});
	
	return jsonArr;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/getdata/getVariableArray</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getVariableArray</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-11-11 16:39:19</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>15f719d9db43a2009b0a74131f961965</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getVariableArray</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_15f719d9db43a2009b0a74131f961965</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-11-11 16:44:19</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="getData">3689a44a6ff922000a09034abb3ee45d</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_bbc19fdcdb15b20054d8ff621f961967
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>ProcessTrackData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var jsonData = [];
	var body = request.body.data; 
	var orgin_id = body.requestId;
	var ticketNum = body.ticker_num;
	var ver = '';
    var sys_id = '';	
	var method = '';
	
    var gr_tracking = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
    gr_tracking.addQuery('u_orgid',orgin_id);
    gr_tracking.query();
    if(gr_tracking.getRowCount() > 0){
       gr_tracking.next();
       ver = gr_tracking.getValue('u_version');
       sys_id = gr_tracking.getValue('sys_id');
       method = 'update';
    }else{
       method = 'insert';
    }
    if(method == 'update'){
       var gr_tracking1 = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
       gr_tracking1.get(sys_id); 
       ver =  (parseInt(ver) + 1).toFixed(0);
       gr_tracking1.u_version = ver;
       gr_tracking1.update();
    }
    if(method == 'insert'){
       var gr_tracking2 = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
       gr_tracking2.initialize();
       gr_tracking2.u_orgid = orgin_id;
       gr_tracking2.u_version = "1";
       gr_tracking2.u_ticket_number = ticketNum;
       gr_tracking2.insert();
    } 
    jsonData.push({
		message: "Completed",
	});
   	
	return jsonData;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/processdata/processTrackData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/processTrackData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-02-28 19:17:45</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>bbc19fdcdb15b20054d8ff621f961967</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ProcessTrackData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_bbc19fdcdb15b20054d8ff621f961967</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-02-28 21:04:20</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="ProcessData">6c22654bdbf22200e92cff621f9619d7</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_64a7f2bbdbf8fa0054d8ff621f961936
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>approvalUpdate</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
 var jsonData = [];
 var body = request.body.data;
 var requestId = body.requestId;
 var approvalId = body.approvalId;
 var selectBioId = body.bioId;
 var esitmateHour = body.estimate;
 var actualHour = body.actualHour;	
 var action = body.action;
 var role = body.role;
 var comments = body.comment;
 var userId = body.userId;
 var isFastTrack = body.isFastTrack;
	
 if(isFastTrack != null && isFastTrack.length > 0 && (isFastTrack == 'yes' || isFastTrack == 'no')){
       var sri = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
       sri.addQuery("sys_id", requestId);
       sri.query();
       sri.next();
	   //use u_director to store a flag for fast Track, use U-investigator to store Bioinformatician id for approval, use u_computer_decal to store estimate hour and actual hour
       sri.u_director= isFastTrack;
       sri.update(); 
 }
	
 if(selectBioId != null && selectBioId != "0" && selectBioId.length >5){
       var request_item = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
       request_item.addQuery("sys_id", requestId);
       request_item.query();
       request_item.next();
  	   request_item.u_investigator = selectBioId;
       request_item.update(); 
 }	

 if(esitmateHour != null && esitmateHour != "0" && esitmateHour.length > 0){
       var request_item1 = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
       request_item1.addQuery("sys_id", requestId);
       request_item1.query();
       request_item1.next();
  	   request_item1.u_computer_decal = "estimate:"+esitmateHour;
       request_item1.update(); 	 
 }
	
 if(actualHour != null && actualHour != "0" && actualHour.length > 0){
       var request_item2 = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
       request_item2.addQuery("sys_id", requestId);
       request_item2.query();
       request_item2.next();
	   var estimate = request_item2.getValue('u_computer_decal');
  	   request_item2.u_computer_decal = estimate + ",acutal:"+actualHour;
       request_item2.update(); 	 
 }		
 var gr = new GlideRecord("sysapproval_approver");
 gr.addQuery("sys_id", approvalId);
 gr.query();
 gr.next();
 gr.state=action;
 gr.comments.setJournalEntry( '(' + action + ') ' + comments + '(role)' + role + '(ENDROLE)' + gs.getUser().getFirstName() + ' ' + gs.getUser().getLastName() + 'ENDCOMMENTS', userId);
 gr.update();	
 
 var message = "succeed";
	
 jsonData.push({
      message: message + "-" + requestId + "-" + action + "-" + role +  "-" + comments ,
 });
                
 return jsonData;	

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/processdata/approvalUpdate</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/approvalUpdate</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-02-14 17:50:07</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>64a7f2bbdbf8fa0054d8ff621f961936</sys_id><sys_mod_count>44</sys_mod_count><sys_name>approvalUpdate</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_64a7f2bbdbf8fa0054d8ff621f961936</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-02-23 23:25:11</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="ProcessData">6c22654bdbf22200e92cff621f9619d7</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at>server</action_run_at><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><application/><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sysapproval_approver</collection><condition>current.state.changesTo('fastTrack') || current.state.changesTo('revise')</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sysapproval_approver">sysapproval.ref_sc_req_item.cat_item=8a7b3449db0f62009b0a74131f961986^EQ<item display_table="sc_cat_item" display_value="DCEG Resource requisition System - BROP" endquery="false" field="sysapproval.ref_sc_req_item.cat_item" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="8a7b3449db0f62009b0a74131f961986"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>DCEG - Run parent workflows (Approval)</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// Run any workflows for our parent so they can check the approval states
//
// 3.20.2011 - modified to use generic approval for any table via the document id/source_table, 
// the check for sysapproval remains to provide backwards compatibility for records already in 
// play that were entered into approval using the sysapproval to store taskID. 
// Going forward, all records will get a document_id and a source table, but if they are null, this
// function assumes sysapproval column in the task table.

runWorkflow_userApprove();

function runWorkflow_userApprove() {
   var id = current.sysapproval.nil() ? current.document_id : current.getValue('sysapproval');
   var table = current.source_table.nil() ? 'task' : current.source_table;
   if (id != null && table != null ) {
      var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
      if (gr.get(id)) {
      	new Workflow().broadcastEventToCurrentsContexts(gr, 'update', null);
      }
   }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>cavellma@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-02-15 19:06:32</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>ede2d0dcdb413e0054d8ff621f9619bb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DCEG - Run parent workflows (Approval)</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ede2d0dcdb413e0054d8ff621f9619bb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>cavellma@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-02-15 19:20:22</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_27e01dc1db4f62009b0a74131f96197d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>submitRequestData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var names = ["name", "requestDate", "projectName", "casCode", "projectId", "trcNumber", "needDate", "requestDescription", "technologyNeed", "whereRun", "otherPlace", "whereStore", "size", "fileFormat", "listDeliverables", "listCollaborators", "imputation", "hpvAnalysis", "matrix", "gwas", "predixan", "ase", "rnaseq", "gwasEnrich", "idsc", "vcf", "pencnv", "gcta", "otherTask", "otherTaskValue", "explanation"];
    var message = '';
    var jsonData = [];
    var variables = {};
    var body = request.body.data; 
	var requested_for = body[0].requested_for;
	var opened_by = body[0].opened_by;
	var cat_item_id = body[0].cat_item;
	var short_description = body[0].short_description;
	var contact_type = body[0].contact_type;
	var itemIds = body[0].variables;
    var comments = body[0].comments;
	
	var gr_request = new GlideRecord('sc_request');
	
	gr_request.initialize();
	gr_request.u_cms_submitted = true;
	gr_request.requested_for = requested_for;
	gr_request.opened_by = opened_by;
	gr_request.contact_type = contact_type;
	var request_id = gr_request.insert();
	
	//create a record in sc_requested_item table
	var gr_requested_item = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
	gr_requested_item.initialize();
	gr_requested_item.u_cms_submitted = true;
	gr_requested_item.cat_item = cat_item_id;
	gr_requested_item.short_description = short_description;
	gr_requested_item.request = request_id;
	if(contact_type != null && contact_type != 'Web'){
		var gr_tracking = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
		gr_tracking.addQuery('u_orgid',contact_type);
		gr_tracking.query();
		gr_tracking.next();
		var version = gr_tracking.getValue('u_version');
		contact_type = contact_type + "," + version;
	}
	gr_requested_item.contact_type = contact_type;
	if(comments != null && comments.length > 20){
		gr_requested_item.comments = comments;
	}
	var submitted_id = gr_requested_item.insert();
	var number = gr_requested_item.number;
	
	//create records in sc_item_option table
	for(var i = 0; i < names.length; i++){
		var gr_answers = new GlideRecord("sc_item_option");
		gr_answers.initialize();
		gr_answers.item_option_new = itemIds[names[i]];
		if(names[i] == 'projectId'){
			var gdt = new GlideDateTime(); 
			var year = gdt.getYear();
			gr_answers.value = "BROP-"+ year + "-" +number.substring(8);
		}else{
			gr_answers.value =  body[0][names[i]];			
		}
		gr_answers.order = i+1;
		var answers_sys_id = gr_answers.insert();
		
		var gr_m2m = new GlideRecord("sc_item_option_mtom");
		gr_m2m.initialize();
		gr_m2m.sc_item_option = answers_sys_id;
		gr_m2m.request_item = submitted_id;
		gr_m2m.insert();
	}
     
	//create a record in sc_req_item table
	var gr_requested_item2 = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
	gr_requested_item2.get(submitted_id);
	var gdt = new GlideDateTime();
	gr_requested_item2.due_date = gdt.getDisplayValue();
	gr_requested_item2.update();
	
	jsonData.push({
           submit_id: (submitted_id).toString(),
		   number: (number).toString()
     });
	
	return jsonData;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/processdata/submitRequestData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/submitRequestData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-11-10 21:27:41</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>27e01dc1db4f62009b0a74131f96197d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>44</sys_mod_count><sys_name>submitRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_27e01dc1db4f62009b0a74131f96197d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-15 21:42:59</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="ProcessData">6c22654bdbf22200e92cff621f9619d7</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getSavedRequest</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var jsonArr = [];
	var userId = request.queryParams.userid;
	var appName = request.queryParams.appName;
    //var userId = "7acff4a96f6f2100e04fd15eae3ee451";
	//var appName = "BROP";
	 var gr_saved_items = new GlideRecord('u_dceg_rrs_saved_request');
         gr_saved_items.addQuery('u_userid', userId);
	     gr_saved_items.addQuery('u_application_name', appName); 
         gr_saved_items.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
         gr_saved_items.query();
	
	while(gr_saved_items.next()){
		var queryStr = gr_saved_items.getValue("u_value");
 		var variables = JSON.parse(queryStr);
		
		jsonArr.push({
			projectName: variables['projectName'],
			name: variables['name'],
			createdOn: gr_saved_items.getValue("sys_created_on"),
			sysId: gr_saved_items.getValue("sys_id"),
		});
	}
	
   return jsonArr;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/getdata/getSavedRequest</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getSavedRequest</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-02-06 21:02:56</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>70179ad9dbfc3a00f59974131f9619ff</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getSavedRequest</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_70179ad9dbfc3a00f59974131f9619ff</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-02-06 22:26:20</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GetData">65a592d9dbfc3a00f59974131f961989</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_5ed6d2d9dbfc3a00f59974131f961989
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getVariableArray</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    // this REST api will return all BROP defined item's ID from question tables
	var names = ["name", "requestDate", "projectName", "casCode", "projectId", "trcNumber", "needDate", "requestDescription", "technologyNeed", "whereRun", "otherPlace", "whereStore", "size", "fileFormat", "listDeliverables", "listCollaborators", "imputation", "hpvAnalysis", "matrix", "gwas", "predixan", "ase", "rnaseq", "gwasEnrich", "idsc", "vcf", "pencnv", "gcta", "otherTask", "otherTaskValue", "explanation"];
    var variables={};
    var email = request.queryParams.email;
	var gr = new GlideRecord("question");
    gr.addQuery("sys_updated_by", email);
    gr.orderBy("order");
    gr.query();

	
	while(gr.next()){
	   var name =  gr.getValue('name');
	   for(var i = 0; i < names.length; i++){
		   if(name == names[i]){
				variables[name] = gr.getValue('sys_id');
				break;
		   }
	   }
	}
	var jsonArr = [];
	jsonArr.push({
		itemId: variables
	});
	
	return jsonArr;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/getdata/getVariableArray</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getVariableArray</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-02-06 21:01:55</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>5ed6d2d9dbfc3a00f59974131f961989</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getVariableArray</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_5ed6d2d9dbfc3a00f59974131f961989</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-15 20:03:07</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GetData">65a592d9dbfc3a00f59974131f961989</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_ebb79149db59320054d8ff621f961952
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at>server</action_run_at><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><application/><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>DCEG_RRS_Withdraw_Submission</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[var contact_type = "";
var org_ticket_num = "";

    
contact_type = current.getValue('contact_type');

if(contact_type == '' || contact_type === undefined || contact_type == 'Web'){
     org_ticket_num = current.number;
	 var gdt = new GlideDateTime(); 
	 var year = gdt.getYear();
     org_ticket_num = "BROP-"+ year + "-" +org_ticket_num .substring(8);
}else{
		var orgIds = contact_type.split(",");
                var gr_tracking_item = GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
               gr_tracking_item.addQuery('u_orgid',orgIds[0]);
               gr_tracking_item.query();
              if ( gr_tracking_item.getRowCount() > 0){
                    gr_tracking_item.next();
                    org_ticket_num = gr_tracking_item.u_ticket_number + "-" + orgIds[1];
                }			
}

var gr_withdraw = new GlideRecord('u_withdraw_record_table');
gr_withdraw.initialize();
gr_withdraw.u_record_id = org_ticket_num;
gr_withdraw.insert();


gs.eventQueue('dceg_rrs.withdraw', gr_withdraw);
//gs.eventQueue('sc_req_item.withdraw', current, gs.getUserID(), gs.getUserName());
gs.logWarning('dceg_rrs.withdraw event triggerred');]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-02 18:26:46</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>ebb79149db59320054d8ff621f961952</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DCEG_RRS_Withdraw_Submission</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ebb79149db59320054d8ff621f961952</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-02 19:26:17</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getSavedRequestById</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var jsonArr = [];
    var savedId = request.queryParams.savedId;	
	var gr_saved_items = new GlideRecord('u_dceg_rrs_saved_request');
	gr_saved_items.addQuery("sys_id", savedId);
    gr_saved_items.query();

	gr_saved_items.next();
	var queryStr = gr_saved_items.getValue('u_value');
    var variables = JSON.parse(queryStr);

	jsonArr.push({
		variable: variables
	});
	
   return jsonArr;

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/getdata/getDataById</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getDataById</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-11-07 20:46:55</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>1cda2188db476200e92cff621f9619f3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getSavedRequestById</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_1cda2188db476200e92cff621f9619f3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-11-08 18:45:30</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="getData">3689a44a6ff922000a09034abb3ee45d</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_ee9e79badb49320054d8ff621f961937
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getAnalysisCompleteRequestData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var jsonArr = [];
    var userId = request.queryParams.userId;
    var desc = request.queryParams.desc;
    var jvar_cat_item_id = "";
	
	var gr_cat_items = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
        gr_cat_items.addQuery('short_description', desc);
        gr_cat_items.query();
		gr_cat_items.next();
 	jvar_cat_item_id = gr_cat_items.getValue('sys_id');
	
	var gr_requested_items = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
    var gc_requested_items = gr_requested_items.addQuery('cat_item', jvar_cat_item_id);
    gr_requested_items.addActiveQuery();
    gr_requested_items.orderByDesc('number');
    gr_requested_items.query();

	var projectName = "";
	var name = "";
	
	var gdt = new GlideDateTime(); 
	var year = gdt.getYear();
	
	while (gr_requested_items.next()){
		var stage = gr_requested_items.context.stage.name;
		var approver = gr_requested_items.u_investigator;
		if(stage == "Analysis Completed" && approver == userId){
			var number = gr_requested_items.number;
			number = "BROP-"+ year + "-" +number.substring(8);
			var variables = gr_requested_items.variables;
			var submittedDate = gr_requested_items.sys_created_on;
			var sysId = gr_requested_items.sys_id;
			var isFastTrack = gr_requested_items.u_director;
			var hours = gr_requested_items.u_computer_decal;
			var hourArr = hours.split(",");
            var estiHour = hourArr[0].substring('estimate:'.length);
			var actHour = hourArr[1].substring('acutal:'.length);
			
			for(key in variables){
				if(variables[key].getGlideObject().getQuestion().getName() == 'projectName'){
					projectName = variables[key].getDisplayValue();
				}
				if(variables[key].getGlideObject().getQuestion().getName() == 'name'){
					name = variables[key].getDisplayValue();
				}
			}
			jsonArr.push({
				number: number.toString(),
				projectName: projectName,
				name: name,
				stage: stage.toString(),
				submitDate: submittedDate.toString(),
				sysId: sysId.toString(),
				isFastTrack: isFastTrack.toString(),
				estimateHour: estiHour,
				actualHour: actHour,
			});
		}	
	}	
	
	return jsonArr;
	
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/getdata/getAnalysisCompleteRequestData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getAnalysisCompleteRequestData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-02-23 21:22:06</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ee9e79badb49320054d8ff621f961937</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getAnalysisCompleteRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_ee9e79badb49320054d8ff621f961937</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-02-23 23:27:51</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GetData">65a592d9dbfc3a00f59974131f961989</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_8ea1d3b5db787a0054d8ff621f961958
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getRequestDetailsById</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
  var jsonArr = [];
  var sysId = request.queryParams.sysId;
	
  var gr_requested_item = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
  gr_requested_item.addQuery('sys_id',sysId );
  gr_requested_item.query();
  gr_requested_item.next();
  var variables = gr_requested_item.variables;
  var number =  gr_requested_item.number;
  var comments = gr_requested_item.comments.getJournalEntry(-1);
	
  jsonArr.push({
	number: number.toString(),
	name:variables['name'].toString(),	
	requestDate:variables['requestDate'].toString(),	
  	projectName:variables['projectName'].toString(),	
	casCode:variables['casCode'].toString(),	
	projectId:variables['projectId'].toString(),	
	trcNumber:variables['trcNumber'].toString(),	
	needDate:variables['needDate'].toString(),
	explanation: variables['explanation'].toString(),
	requestDescription:variables['requestDescription'].toString(),	
	technologyNeed:variables['technologyNeed'].toString(),	
	whereRun:variables['whereRun'].toString(),	
	otherPlace:variables['otherPlace'].toString(),	
	whereStore:variables['whereStore'].toString(),	
	size:variables['size'].toString(),	
	fileFormat:variables['fileFormat'].toString(),	
	listDeliverables:variables['listDeliverables'].toString(),	
	listCollaborators:variables['listCollaborators'].toString(),	
	imputation:variables['imputation'].toString(),	
	hpvAnalysis:variables['hpvAnalysis'].toString(),	
	matrix:variables['matrix'].toString(),	
	gwas:variables['gwas'].toString(),	
	predixan:variables['predixan'].toString(),	
	ase:variables['ase'].toString(),	
	rnaseq:variables['rnaseq'].toString(),	
	gwasEnrich:variables['gwasEnrich'].toString(),	
	idsc:variables['idsc'].toString(),	
	vcf:variables['vcf'].toString(),	
	pencnv:variables['pencnv'].toString(),	
	gcta:variables['gcta'].toString(),	
	otherTask:variables['otherTask'].toString(),	
    otherTaskValue:variables['otherTaskValue'].toString(),
	comments: comments.toString()  
  });	
	
  return jsonArr;	
})(request, response);
]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/getdata/getRequestDetailsById</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getRequestDetailsById</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-02-08 14:35:41</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>8ea1d3b5db787a0054d8ff621f961958</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getRequestDetailsById</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_8ea1d3b5db787a0054d8ff621f961958</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-15 21:32:58</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GetData">65a592d9dbfc3a00f59974131f961989</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_38ad93d6db81320054d8ff621f961913
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getBioinformaticianGroupMember</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
         var jsonArr = [];
	     var bioMemberList = "Assign To        <select id='bioMemberList'  style='width: 400px'><option value='0'>Please select a bioinformatician</option>";
		 var getMembers = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
         getMembers.addQuery('group.name','DCEG_BIOINFORMATIC');
	     getMembers.orderBy("user.last_name");
         getMembers.query();
         while(getMembers.next())
         {
			var getTask = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
			    getTask.addQuery('u_investigator', getMembers.user);
			    getTask.query();
			var count = 0;
			var hours = 0;
			 var estiHour = 0;
			while (getTask.next()){
				var stage = getTask.context.stage.name;
				var amount = (getTask.u_computer_decal).toString();
				var h = 0;
				
				if(stage == "In Bioinformatician's queue" || stage == "Analysis in Progress" ){
					if(amount != null && amount.length > 1){
						 h = amount.split(",");
						 estiHour = h[0].substring('estimate:'.length);
					}
					hours = parseFloat(hours) + parseFloat(estiHour);
					count++;
				}
			} 
			bioMemberList = bioMemberList + "<option value='" + getMembers.user +"'>" + getMembers.user.first_name + " " + getMembers.user.last_name + "  [ " + count + " Task(s), "+ hours + " Hour(s) ]"  + "</option>";  
 		 }
	
	     bioMemberList = bioMemberList + "</select>";
	     gs.print(bioMemberList);
	     jsonArr.push({
			 option: bioMemberList,
		 });
	     return jsonArr;

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/getdata/getBioinformaticianGroupMember</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getBioinformaticianGroupMember</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-02-22 15:05:19</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>38ad93d6db81320054d8ff621f961913</sys_id><sys_mod_count>22</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getBioinformaticianGroupMember</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_38ad93d6db81320054d8ff621f961913</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-02-24 20:28:27</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GetData">65a592d9dbfc3a00f59974131f961989</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_1778af76dbd9b20054d8ff621f9619e6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="DELETE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>checkAssociation</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var jsonArr = [];
	var gdsp_id = request.queryParams.gdsp_id.toString();
	var ned_id = request.queryParams.ned_id.toString();
	var association = '123';
    var base_id = gdsp_id.substring(8);
	var real_gdsp_id = 'NCI-RITM' + base_id;
	var req_items = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
	req_items.addQuery('opened_by.user_id', ned_id);
	req_items.addQuery('number', real_gdsp_id);
	req_items.query();
	if(req_items.getRowCount() > 0){
		association = "True";
	}else{
		association = "False";
	}
	var obj_id = '';
	if(association == 'False'){
		var real_id = base_id.substring(0, base_id.indexOf('-'));
		var tracking_items = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
		tracking_items.addQuery('u_ticket_number', 'CONTAINS', real_id);
		tracking_items.query();
		tracking_items.next();
		
		obj_id = tracking_items.u_orgid;
		var req_items1 = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
		req_items1.addQuery('opened_by.user_id', ned_id);
		req_items1.addQuery('contact_type','CONTAINS', obj_id);
		req_items1.query();
		if(req_items1.getRowCount() > 0){
			association = "True";
		}else{
			association = "False";
		}
	}

	jsonArr.push({
		ned_id: ned_id.toString(),
		gdsp_id: gdsp_id.toString(),
		association: association.toString(),
	});
   return jsonArr;

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/getdata/checkAssociation</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/checkAssociation</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-08 15:21:00</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>1778af76dbd9b20054d8ff621f9619e6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>35</sys_mod_count><sys_name>checkAssociation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_1778af76dbd9b20054d8ff621f9619e6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-08 17:07:21</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GetData">65a592d9dbfc3a00f59974131f961989</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_ed161ad9dbfc3a00f59974131f9619ac
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getCatItemId</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var jsonArr = [];
	var name = request.queryParams.name;
	
	var gr_cat_items = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
        gr_cat_items.addQuery('short_description', name);
        gr_cat_items.query();
		gr_cat_items.next();
 	var data = gr_cat_items.getValue('sys_id');
	
	jsonArr.push({
			id: data
	});
	
   return jsonArr;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/getdata/getCatItemId</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getCatItemId</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-02-06 20:59:31</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ed161ad9dbfc3a00f59974131f9619ac</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getCatItemId</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_ed161ad9dbfc3a00f59974131f9619ac</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-02-06 20:59:31</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GetData">65a592d9dbfc3a00f59974131f961989</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>SaveRequestData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var message = '';
    var jsonData = [];
    var variables = {};
    var body = request.body.data; //this string will be saved into database
	var action = body[0].action;
	var userId = body[0].user_id;
	var appName = body[0].applicationName;
   
	for(key in body[0]){
		variables[key] = body[0][key];
	}
	var saveData = JSON.stringify(variables);
	if(action == 'add'){
        var save_request = new GlideRecord('u_dceg_rrs_saved_request');
        save_request.initialize();
        save_request.u_value = saveData;
        save_request.u_userid = userId;
        save_request.u_application_name = appName;
        message = save_request.insert();
     }else if(action == 'update'){
       var existId = variables['savedId'];
       var update_request = new GlideRecord('u_dceg_rrs_saved_request');
       update_request.addQuery('sys_id',existId);
       update_request.query();
       update_request.next();
       update_request.u_value = saveData;
       update_request.u_userid = userId;
       update_request.u_application_name = appName;
       answers_sys_id = update_request.update();                    
     }else if(action == 'delete'){
         var saved_id =variables['savedId'];
         var delete_request = new GlideRecord('u_dceg_rrs_saved_request');
         delete_request.addQuery('sys_id',saved_id);
         delete_request.query();
         delete_request.next();
         answers_sys_id = delete_request.deleteRecord();
         message = saved_id;
     }else{
         message = "Invalid action.";
     }
     jsonData.push({
           message: message,
     });
                
     return jsonData;

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/processdata/savedata</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/savedata</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description>Save Request data into user defined table. These data will be submitted later</short_description><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-11-04 17:38:12</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>7752a94bdbf22200e92cff621f961930</sys_id><sys_mod_count>111</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SaveRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_7752a94bdbf22200e92cff621f961930</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-11-08 19:14:30</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="ProcessData">6c22654bdbf22200e92cff621f9619d7</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_6e180a9fdb72a6009b0a74131f961954
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getSavedRequest</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var jsonArr = [];
	var userId = request.queryParams.userid;
	var appName = request.queryParams.appName;
	
	 var gr_saved_items = new GlideRecord('u_dceg_rrs_saved_request');
         gr_saved_items.addQuery('u_userid', userId);
	     gr_saved_items.addQuery('u_application_name', appName); 
         gr_saved_items.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
         gr_saved_items.query();
	
	while(gr_saved_items.next()){
		var queryStr = gr_saved_items.getValue("u_value");
 		var variables = JSON.parse(queryStr);
		
		jsonArr.push({
			projectName: variables['projectName'],
			name: variables['name'],
			createdOn: gr_saved_items.getValue("sys_created_on"),
			sysId: gr_saved_items.getValue("sys_id"),
		});
	}
	
   return jsonArr;

})(request, response);

]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/getdata/getSavedRequest</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getSavedRequest</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-11-05 15:00:43</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>6e180a9fdb72a6009b0a74131f961954</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getSavedRequest</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_6e180a9fdb72a6009b0a74131f961954</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-11-08 18:48:51</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="getData">3689a44a6ff922000a09034abb3ee45d</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="content_block_programmatic"><content_block_programmatic action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><category>general</category><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><frame/><logged_on>false</logged_on><name>Software_Solution_DCEG_RRS_Home</name><programmatic_content><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<g:include_script src="angularjs.min.1.4.9.js.jsdbx"/>
	<g:include_script src="jqueryCDN.jsdbx"/>	
	<g:include_script src="dirPagination.jsdbx"/>
	<g:include_script src="bootstrapCDN.jsdbx"/>
	<g:include_script src="typeahead.bundle.jsdbx"/>
	<g2:requires name="userPrediction.jsdbx"/>
	<g2:requires name="locationPrediction.jsdbx"/>
	<g2:requires name="cms_catalog_functions.jsdbx"/>
	<g2:requires name="cms_typeahead_functions.jsdbx"/>
	<g:include_script src="jquery.min.jsdbx"/>
	<g:include_script src="jquery.ui.jsdbx"/>
	<g:evaluate var="jvar_my_sys_id" expression="gs.getUserID()"/>
	<g:evaluate var="jvar_record_sys_id" expression="RP.getParameterValue('sys_id')"/>
	<g2:cms_modals/>
	<g2:cms_header/>
	<g:evaluate> var g_ck = gs.getSessionToken(); </g:evaluate>
	
	<script>
	var itemIdArray = {};	
	var applicationName = "BROP";
	var cat_item_desc = "DCEG Resource Requisition Application";
	var cat_item_id='';	
	var names = ["name", "requestDate", "projectName", "casCode", "projectId", "trcNumber", "needDate", "requestDescription", "technologyNeed", "whereRun", "otherPlace", "whereStore", "size", "fileFormat", "listDeliverables", "listCollaborators", "imputation", "hpvAnalysis", "matrix", "gwas", "predixan", "ase", "rnaseq", "gwasEnrich", "idsc", "vcf", "pencnv", "gcta", "otherTask", "otherTaskValue", "explanation"];
	var textFields = ["name", "requestDate", "projectName", "casCode", "projectId", "trcNumber", "needDate", "requestDescription", "technologyNeed", "whereRun", "otherPlace", "whereStore", "size", "fileFormat", "listDeliverables", "listCollaborators", "otherTaskValue", "explanation"];
	var checkboxs = ["imputation", "hpvAnalysis", "matrix", "gwas", "predixan", "ase", "rnaseq", "gwasEnrich", "idsc", "vcf", "pencnv", "gcta", "otherTask"];
	var bioMemberOption="";
		
	jQuery(document).ready(function($){	
		history.pushState(null, null, '');
		window.addEventListener('popstate', function(event) {
						history.pushState(null, null, '');
		});
		$("#requestDate").datepicker();
		$("#needDate").datepicker();
		if(isDCEGPI() || isDCEGCommittee() || isDCEGChair()){
			$('#submitterSpan').show();
		}else{
			$('#submitterSpan').hide();
		}
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "GET",
		  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getCatItemId",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: {name: cat_item_desc},
		  async: false,
		  success: function(data){
			  cat_item_id=data.result[0].id; 
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
		  }
		});		
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "GET",
		  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getVariableArray",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: {email: 'zhoujim@nih.gov'},
		  async: false,
		  success: function(data){
			  itemIdArray = data.result[0].itemId;
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
		  }
		});	
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "GET",
		  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getBioinformaticianGroupMember",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  async: false,
		  success: function(data){
		      bioMemberOption = data.result[0].option;
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
		  }
		});			
		
		showSubmitButton();
	});
	
	angular.module('saveRequestTable', ['angularUtils.directives.dirPagination']);
	angular.module('saveRequestTable').controller('saveTableControl', function($scope, $http){ 
		$scope.myData = [];
		$('#saved_table').hide(); 
		if(isDCEGPI()){
			$.ajax({
			  dataType: "json",
			  type: "GET",
			  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getSavedRequest",
			  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
			  data: {userid:'${jvar_my_sys_id}', appName: applicationName},
			  success: function(data){
				  $scope.myData=data.result.slice(0); 
				  $scope.count = data.result.length;
				  if( data.result.length == 0){
					  $('#saved_table').hide();  
				  }else{
					  $('#saved_table').show();  
				  }
				  $scope.$apply();   
			  },
			  error: function(data){
					alert("ERROR");
			  }
		   });
	   }
	   $scope.listDetails = function(id1){
			loadSavedDetails(id1);
		    $scope.$apply(); 
	   }
	   $scope.removeItem = function(id){
		    loadDeleteSaveConfirm(id);
			$scope.$apply();
	   }
	   $scope.sort=function(keyname){
	 	  $scope.sortKey = keyname;
	 	  $scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	   }	
	});
	               	
	angular.module('saveRequestTable').controller('piSubmittedControl', function($scope, $http){ 
		$scope.myData = [];
		$('#submitted_table').hide(); 
		if(isDCEGPI() || isDCEGCommittee() || isDCEGChair()){
			$.ajax({
			  dataType: "json",
			  type: "GET",
			  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getSubmittedRequestData",
			  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
			  data: {userid:'${jvar_my_sys_id}', desc: cat_item_desc},
			  success: function(data){
				  $scope.myData=data.result; 
				  $scope.count = data.result.length;
				  if( data.result.length == 0){
					  $('#submitted_table').hide();  
				  }else{
					  $('#submitted_table').show();  
				  }
				  $scope.$apply();   
			  },
			  error: function(data){
					alert("ERROR");
			  }
			});
		}
		$scope.displayDetails = function(id){
		     showActionButton('pi');
			 loadRequestDetails(id);
		     $scope.$apply(); 
	   }
		
       $scope.withdrawItem = function(id){
			loadWithdrawRequestConfirm(id);
		    $scope.$apply(); 
	   }
       $scope.resubmitProposal = function(id, ticketNum){
		    loadResubmitDetail(id, ticketNum); 
		    $scope.$apply(); 
	   }
	   $scope.sort=function(keyname){
	 	  $scope.sortKey = keyname;
	 	  $scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	   }		
	});

    // secretary table

			  data: {type: method, catDesc: cat_item_desc, userId: '${jvar_my_sys_id}'},
			  success: function(data){
				  $scope.myData=data.result;

				  if( data.result.length == 0){

		}
		$scope.displayDetails = function(id, approvalId){
			 showActionButton('secretary');
		     loadRequestDetails(id, approvalId);

	   }		
	   $scope.sort=function(keyname){
	 	  $scope.sortKey = keyname;
	 	  $scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse;
	   }		
		
	});
    //there will be more tables for secretary
