	function showActionButton(type){
		//order is important
		if(type=="pi"){
			$('#okDiv').show();
			$('#secretaryActionDiv').hide();
			$('#chairmanActionDiv').hide();
			$('#committeeActionDiv').hide();
			var commentLength = $('#commentLength').val();
			if(commentLength > 5){
				$('#commets').show();
			}else{
				$('#commets').hide();
			}
		    $('#bioSelectorId').hide();
			$('#commentTextarea').hide();
			$('#secretaryFinalDiv').hide();
			$('#bioinfoStartProcessDiv').hide();
			$('#bioinfoTransferDiv').hide();
			$('#estimateHourDiv').hide();
			$('#transferActionDiv').hide();	
		    $('#progressActionDiv').hide();
		    $('#actualHourDiv').hide();
		}
		if(type=="secretary"){
			$('#okDiv').hide();
			$('#secretaryActionDiv').show();
			$('#chairmanActionDiv').hide();
			$('#committeeActionDiv').hide();
		    $('#secretaryFinalDiv').hide();
			$('#commets').show();	
		    $('#bioSelectorId').hide();
			$('#commentTextarea').show();
			$('#bioinfoStartProcessDiv').hide();
			$('#bioinfoTransferDiv').hide();
			$('#estimateHourDiv').hide();

	function callWithdrawRequest(){
	    //get all data detail 
		var variables = [{}];
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "GET",
		  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getRequestDetailsById",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: {sysId: recId},
		  async: false,
		  success: function(data){
		      var obj = data.result[0];
		      for(var i = 0; i < names.length; i++){
		         var value = obj[names[i]];
				 variables[0][names[i]] = value;		
			  }	
		      var comments = obj['comments'];
			  variables[0]['comments'] = comments;
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
		  }
		});		
		
		variables[0].user_id = "${jvar_my_sys_id}";
		variables[0].applicationName = applicationName;	
		variables[0].action = 'add';
		var param = JSON.stringify(variables);
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "POST",
		  contentType: "application/json",
		  url: "/api/naci/processdata/savedata",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: param,
          async: false,
		  success: function(data){
		       window.location.reload(true); 
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
	      }
		});
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "GET",
		  url: "/api/naci/processdata/withdrawRequest",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: {sysId: recId},
		  async: false,
		  success: function(data){
	           closeRequestConfirm();
		       window.location.reload(true);
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert(data);
		  }
		});		
	}
		
    function loadRequestDetails(id, id2){
		$('#commentLength').val('0');
		cleanApprovalError();
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "GET",
		  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getRequestDetailsById",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: {sysId: id},
		  async: false,
		  success: function(data){
		      var obj = data.result[0];
		      for(var i = 0; i < textFields.length; i++){
		         var value = obj[textFields[i]];
				 if(textFields[i].indexOf('Date') > 0){
					value = getConvertedValue(value, "1"); 
				 }
				 $('#'+textFields[i]+"1").html(value);	
			  }	
			  for(var k = 0; k 	< checkboxs.length; k++){
				 var value = obj[checkboxs[k]];
				 if(value == 'true'){
					 $('#' + checkboxs[k] + "1").prop('checked', 'cheked');
				 }
			  }
		      $('#hideRequestId').val(id); 
		      $('#hideApprovalId').val(id2);  //approve, reject or fast track action will use this id for further process.
		      var comments = obj['comments'];
			  $('#commentLength').val(comments.length);
			  if(comments != null && comments.length > 5){
					comments = parse(comments);
		            $('#commentReviewId1').html(comments);
			  }else{
					$('#commets').hide();
		      }
	
			  $('#proposalDetail').modal('show');

		},
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
		  }
		});		
	}
		
	function parse(allcomments) {

		 var comments = allcomments.split("ENDCOMMENTS");
		 var commentsblock = '<table class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed" width="100%"><tr><th>Role</th><th>Approver</th><th>Approval Status</th><th>Comments</th><th>Time</th></tr>'
		 for(i = 0; i < comments .length; i++){
			 if (comments[i].length > 40) { 
			   if (comments[i][0] == '\n') {
				   var lastI = 0;
				   while (lastI < comments[i].length && comments[i][lastI] == '\n') 
						lastI ++;
				   comments[i] = comments[i].substring(lastI,comments[i].length);
			   }
			   var t = comments[i].substring(0,22);
			   var approver = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')+9,comments[i].length);
			   var results = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 57,comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 65);
			   var comm= comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 66, comments[i].indexOf('(role)'));
			   var role = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(role)') + 6, comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')); 
			   commentsblock = commentsblock + "<tr>";
			   commentsblock = commentsblock + "<td>" + role + "</td>";
			   commentsblock = commentsblock + "<td>" + approver + "</td>";
			   if(results == 'approved'){
				   results = "Recommend to Approve"; 
			   }else if(results == 'rejected'){
				   results = "Recommend to Revise";
			   }else{
				  results = "Unknown Action";
			   }
			   commentsblock = commentsblock + "<td>" + results+ "</td>";
			   commentsblock = commentsblock + "<td>" + comm + "</td>";
			   commentsblock = commentsblock + "<td>" + t + "</td>";
			   commentsblock = commentsblock + "</tr>";
			 }
		 }
		 commentsblock = commentsblock + "</table>";

	return commentsblock;
	}

	var recId = '';	
	function loadSavedDetails(id){
		clearForm();
		$('#resubmit').hide();
		$('#submit').show();
		$('#save').show();
		getSavedRequestById(id);
	}
		
	function getSavedRequestById(id){
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "GET",
		  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getDataById",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: {savedId: id},
		  success: function(data){
			    var variables = data.result[0].variable;
				for(key in variables){
					if(textFields.indexOf(key) > -1){
						if(key == 'requestDate' || key == 'needDate'){
							 $('#'+key).val(getConvertedValue(variables[key], 1));
						}else{
							$('#'+key).val(variables[key]);
							if(key == 'whereRun'){
								if(variables[key] == 'other'){	
									$('#otherPlace').show();
								}else{
									$('#otherPlace').hide();
								}
							}
						}
					}else{
						if(variables[key] == 'true'){
							$('#'+key).prop('checked', true);
							if(key == 'otherTask'){
								$('#otherTaskValue').prop('disabled', false);
							}
						}else{
							$('#'+key).prop('checked', false);
						}
					}
				}
				$('#hideValue').val(id);
				$('#newProposal').modal('show');
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
	      }
		});		
	}

	function callSecretaryUpdateApproval(){
		cleanApprovalError();
		if(updateValidation()){
		    showApprovalError();
		}else{
			var comments = $('#commentsText').val();
			var id = $('#hideRequestId').val();
			var approvalId = $('#hideApprovalId').val();
			var user = approver;
			var user_id = '${jvar_my_sys_id}';
			var act = action;
			var variables ={};
			variables['requestId'] = id;
			variables['approvalId'] = approvalId;
			variables['role'] = user;
			variables['action'] = act;
			variables['comment'] = comments;
			variables['userId'] = user_id;
			variables['isFastTrack'] = isFastTrack;
			var selectedBio = $('#bioMemberList').val();
			if(selectedBio != null && selectedBio != "0" && selectedBio.length > 5){
				variables['bioId'] =  selectedBio;
			}else{
				variables['bioId'] =  "0";
			}
			var estimateHour = $('#estimateHour').val();
			if(estimateHour != null && estimateHour != "0" && estimateHour.length > 0){
				variables['estimate'] =  estimateHour;
				variables['comment'] = 'Analysis in Progress';
			}else{
				variables['esitmate'] =  "0";
			}
			var actualHour = $('#actualHour').val();
			if(actualHour != null && actualHour != "0" && actualHour.length > 0){
				variables['actualHour'] =  actualHour;
				variables['comment'] = 'Complete Analysis';
			}else{
				variables['actualHour'] =  "0";
			}		
			var param = JSON.stringify(variables);
			$.ajax({
			  dataType: "json",
			  contentType: "application/json",
			  type: "POST",
			  url: "/api/naci/processdata/approvalUpdate",
			  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
			  data: param,
			  success: function(data){
				  //alert(data.result[0].message);
				   window.location.reload(true);
				  $('#confirmationDiv').modal('hide');
			  },
			  error: function(data){
					alert("ERROR");
			  }
			});		
	   }
	}
	
	function updateValidation(){
		var error = false;
		if(checkTextarea == "1"){
			if(($('#commentsText').val().trim()).length == 0){
				error = true; //true means there is an error
			}
		}
		if(checkList == "1"){
			if($('#bioMemberList').val() == "0"){
				error = true;
			}
		}
		if(checkText == "1"){
		  if(hourType == "estimate"){
			  if($('#estimateHour').val().trim().length == 0){
				  error = true;
			  }
		  }
		  if(hourType == "actual"){
		 	 if($('#actualHour').val().trim().length == 0){
			   error = true;
		     }
		  }
		}
		
		return error;
	}
	function showApprovalError(){
		var message1 = "Please fill in data into the highlighted area.";
		var message2 = "Please select an Bioinformatician";
		
		if(checkTextarea == "1"){
			if($('#commentsText').val().trim().length == 0){
				$('#errMsg').html('<font color="red">'+message1+'</font>');
				$('#commentsText').css("background-color", "yellow");
			}
		}
		if(checkList == "1"){
			if($('#bioMemberList').val() == "0"){
				$('#errMsg').html('<font color="red">'+message2+'</font>');
				$('#bioMemberList').css("background-color", "yellow");
			}
		}
		if(checkTextarea == "1" && checkList == "1"){
			if(	$('#commentsText').val().trim().length == 0  && $('#bioMemberList').val() == "0"){
				$('#errMsg').html('<div><font color="red">'+message1+'</font></div><div><font color="red">'+message2+'</font></div>');
			}
		}
		if(checkText == "1"){
			if($('#estimateHour').val().trim().length == 0 || $('#actualHour').val().trim().length == 0){
				$('#errMsg').html('<font color="red">'+message1+'</font>');
				$('#actualHour').css("background-color", "yellow");
				$('#estimateHour').css("background-color", "yellow");
			}
		}
	    $('#errMsg').show();
		moveToApprovalTop()
		closeRequestConfirm();
	}
	function cleanApprovalError(){
			$('#errMsg').html('');
		    $('#commentsText').css("background-color", "");
		    $('#bioMemberList').css("background-color", "");
			$('#actualHour').css("background-color", "");
		    $('#estimateHour').css("background-color", "");
	}

	function loadWithdrawRequestConfirm(rid){

		removeAllListener();
		document.getElementById('submitAction').addEventListener("click", callWithdrawRequest, false);
		$('#confirmationDiv').modal('show');
	}
	function loadResubmitConfirm(){ 
		$('#confirmMessage').html("<br/><b>Are you sure you want to resubmit this request?</b><br/>");
		removeAllListener();
		document.getElementById('submitAction').addEventListener("click", callResubmitRequest, false);
		$('#confirmationDiv').modal('show');		
	}		
	function removeAllListener() {
	   //remove all added event listener (very important!)
		document.getElementById('submitAction').removeEventListener("click", callDeleteSave, false);
		document.getElementById('submitAction').removeEventListener("click", callWithdrawRequest, false);
		document.getElementById('submitAction').removeEventListener("click", callSecretaryUpdateApproval, false);
		document.getElementById('submitAction').removeEventListener("click", callResubmitRequest, false);
		document.getElementById('submitAction').removeEventListener("click", submitRequest, false);
	} 		

	function callResubmitRequest(){ 
	    closeRequestConfirm();	
		resubmit();
	}
	function callDeleteSave(){
		var variables =getDeleteParam();
	    var param = JSON.stringify(variables);
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "POST",
		  contentType: "application/json",
		  url: "/api/naci/processdata/savedata",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: param,
		  success: function(data){
		       closeRequestConfirm();
		       window.location.reload(true);
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
	      }
		});	
	}
		
	function loadResubmitDetail(id, ticketNum){
		$('#commentLength').val('0');
		cleanApprovalError();		
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "GET",
		  url: "/api/naci/getdata/getRequestDetailsById",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: {sysId: id},
		  async: false,
		  success: function(data){
		      var obj = data.result[0];
		      for(var i = 0; i < textFields.length; i++){
		         var value = obj[textFields[i]];
				 if(textFields[i].indexOf('Date') > 0){
					value = getConvertedValue(value, "1");
				 }
				 $('#'+textFields[i]).val(value);		
			  }	
			  for(var k = 0; k 	< checkboxs.length; k++){
				 var value = obj[checkboxs[k]];
				 if(value == 'true'){
					 $('#' + checkboxs[k]).prop('checked', 'cheked');
				 }
			  }
		      $('#hideRequestId').val(id); 
		      var comments = obj['comments'];
			  $('#hideComments').val(comments);
		      $('#hideTicketNum').val(ticketNum); 
		      $('#save').hide();  
		      $('#submit').hide();
		      $('#resubmit').show();
			  $('#newProposal').modal('show');
		  },
		  error: function(data){
		     alert("ERROR");
		  } 
	    });
	}
	function getDeleteParam(){
		var variables ={};
		variables['action'] = 'delete';
		variables['user_id'] = "${jvar_my_sys_id}";
		variables['applicationName'] = applicationName;
		variables['savedId'] = recId;
		
		return [variables];
	}
		
	function deleteSavedData(){
		var variables = prepareParam();
		var param = JSON.stringify(variables);
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "POST",
		  contentType: "application/json",
		  url: "/api/naci/processdata/savedata",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: param,
		  success: function(data){
			 window.location.reload(true);
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
	      }
		});		
	}		
	function prepareParam(){
		var variables ={};
		variables['action'] = 'delete';
		variables['user_id'] = "${jvar_my_sys_id}";
		variables['applicationName'] = applicationName;
		variables['savedId'] = $('#hideValue').val();
		
		return [variables];	
	}
		
	function logout(){
	   window.location.href="/logout.do";
	}
	
	function newProposal(){
		clearForm();
		clearError();
		enableButtons();
		$('#hideValue').val('none');
		$('#newProposal').modal('show');
	}
		
	function closeWin(){
		$('#newProposal').modal('hide');
	}
	function closeDetailPage(){
		$('#proposalDetail').modal('hide');
	}
	function closeRequestConfirm(){
	    $('#confirmationDiv').modal('hide');
		$('#confirmationDiv').on('hidden.bs.modal', function (e) {
			$('body').addClass('modal-open');
		});		
	}	
	function valueChange(){
   		var location = $('#whereRun').val();
   		if(location == 'other'){
   			$('#otherPlace').show();
   		}else{
		    $('#otherPlace').val('');
   			$('#otherPlace').hide();
   		}
   }	
    function otherTaskChange(){
   		if($('#otherTask').is(':checked')){
   			$('#otherTaskValue').prop('disabled', false);
   		}else{
   			$('#otherTaskValue').val(' ');
   			$('#otherTaskValue').prop('disabled', true);
   		}
    }
		
	function disableButtons(){
		$('#submit').attr('disabled', 'disabled');
		$('#save').attr('disabled', 'disabled');
		$('#cancel').attr('disabled', 'disabled');
	}
		
	function enableButtons(){
		$('#submit').removeAttr('disabled');
		$('#save').removeAttr('disabled', 'disabled');
		$('#save').show();
		$('#submit').show();
		$('#resubmit').hide();
		$('#cancel').removeAttr('disabled', 'disabled');
	}
	
	function resubmit(){
		var trackData = {};
		clearError();
        var variables = getProposalData();
		var error = validateTextField(variables[0]);
		var error1 = validateCheckbox(variables[0]);
		if(error.length > 0 || error1.length > 0){
			if(error.length > 0){
				showError(error);
			}
			if(error1.length > 0){
				showError(error1);
			}
			closeRequestConfirm();
			moveToTop();
		}else{	
		    var requestId =  $('#hideRequestId').val();;
		    var ticketNumber = $('#hideTicketNum').val();
		    trackData['requestId'] = requestId;
		    trackData['ticker_num'] = ticketNumber;
			var param = JSON.stringify(trackData);
			$.ajax({
			  dataType: "json",
			  type: "POST",
			  contentType: "application/json",
			  url: "/api/naci/processdata/processTrackData",
			  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
			  data: param,
			  async: false,
			  success: function(data){
				resubmitData(requestId);
			  },
			  error: function(data){
					alert("ERROR");
			  }
			});						
		}
		
	}	
	
	function resubmitData(orgin_req_id){
		var variables = getProposalData();
		var currentDate = new Date().toLocaleDateString();
		variables[0].requestDate = getConvertedValue(currentDate, 0);
		variables[0].requested_for = "${jvar_my_sys_id}";
		variables[0].opened_by = "${jvar_my_sys_id}";
		variables[0].cat_item = cat_item_id;
		variables[0].short_description ="DCEG Resource requisition System - BROP";
		variables[0].contact_type=orgin_req_id.toString(); 
		variables[0].variables = itemIdArray;
		var preComments = $('#hideComments').val();
		if(preComments.length >= 50){
			var index = preComments.indexOf('Added comment to Approval record:');
		    preComments = preComments.substring(index);
		}
		variables[0].comments = preComments; 
		var param = JSON.stringify(variables);
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "POST",
		  contentType: "application/json",
		  url: "/api/naci/processdata/submitRequestData",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: param,
		  success: function(data){
		     window.location.reload(true);
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
		  }
		});				
	}
		
	function submitRequest(){
		clearError();
		var variables = getProposalData();
		var currentDate = new Date().toLocaleDateString();
		variables[0].requestDate = getConvertedValue(currentDate, 0);
		var error = validateTextField(variables[0]);
		var error1 = validateCheckbox(variables[0]);
		if(error.length > 0 || error1.length > 0){
			if(error.length > 0){
				showError(error);
			}
			if(error1.length > 0){
				showError(error1);
			}
			closeRequestConfirm();
			moveToTop();
		}else{
			disableButtons();
			variables[0].requested_for = "${jvar_my_sys_id}";
			variables[0].opened_by = "${jvar_my_sys_id}";
			variables[0].cat_item = cat_item_id;
			variables[0].short_description ="DCEG Resource requisition System - BROP";
			variables[0].contact_type="Web";
			variables[0].variables = itemIdArray;
			var param = JSON.stringify(variables);
			$.ajax({
			  dataType: "json",
			  type: "POST",
			  contentType: "application/json",
			  url: "/api/naci/processdata/submitRequestData",
			  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
			  data: param,
			  success: function(data){
		        var hideValue = $('#hideValue').val();
				if(hideValue != null  && hideValue.trim() != ''  && hideValue != "none"){
					deleteSavedData();
				}else{
				 window.location.reload(true);
				}	
			  },
			  error: function(data){
					alert("ERROR");
			  }
			});			
		}
	}
		
	function validateTextField(variables){
		var error = [];
		//validate textFields first
		for (i = 0; i < textFields.length; i++){
		    if(textFields[i] != 'needDate' && textFields[i] != 'explanation' && textFields[i] != 'projectId' && textFields[i] != 'requestDate' ){
				var value = variables[textFields[i]];
				if(textFields[i] == 'whereRun'){
					if(variables['whereRun'] == null){
						value = '';
					}
				}else{
					value = value.trim();
				}

				if(textFields[i] == 'otherPlace'){
					if(variables['whereRun'] == "other"){
						if(value.length == 0){
							error.push(textFields[i]);
						}
					}
				}else if(value.length == 0){
					if(textFields[i] != 'otherTaskValue'){
						error.push(textFields[i]);
					}
				}
		    }
		}
		
		return error;
	}
		
	function validateCheckbox(variables){
		var error=[];
		var selected = '';
		for(i = 0; i < checkboxs.length; i++){
			if(variables[checkboxs[i]] == 'true'){
				selected = 'true';
				break;
			}else{
				selected = 'false';
			}
		}
		if(selected == 'false'){
			error.push('err');
		}else{
			if(variables['otherTask'] == 'true'){
				if(variables['otherTaskValue'].trim().length == 0){
					error.push('otherTaskValue');
				}
			}
		}
		return error;
	}
		
	function moveToTop(){
		var container = $('#newProposal'), scrollTo = $('#anchor');
		container.scrollTop(scrollTo.offset().top - container.offset().top + container.scrollTop());
		container.animate({scrollTop: scrollTo.offset().top - container.offset().top + container.scrollTop()});
	}
	function moveToApprovalTop(){
		var container = $('#proposalDetail'), scrollTo = $('#anchor1');
		container.scrollTop(scrollTo.offset().top - container.offset().top + container.scrollTop());
		container.animate({scrollTop: scrollTo.offset().top - container.offset().top + container.scrollTop()});
	}	
	function showError(error){
		$('#errorMessage').html("<font color='red'> Please fill in data into highlight area.</font>");
		$('#errorMessage').show();
		for(i = 0; i < error.length; i++){
			$('#'+error[i]).css("background-color","yellow");
		}
	}
	
	function clearError(){
		$('#errorMessage').html("");
		$('#errorMessage').hide();
		for(i = 0; i < textFields.length; i++){
			$('#'+textFields[i]).css("background-color","");
		}
		$('#err').css("background-color","");
		$('#otherTaskValue').css("background-color","");
	}
	
	function saveRequest(){
		var variables = getProposalData();
		variables[0].user_id = "${jvar_my_sys_id}";
		variables[0].applicationName = applicationName;		
		var existId = $('#hideValue').val();
		if(existId != 'none'){
			variables[0].action = 'update';
		    variables[0].savedId = existId;
		}else{
			variables[0].action = 'add';
		}
		var param = JSON.stringify(variables);
		
		$.ajax({
		  dataType: "json",
		  type: "POST",
		  contentType: "application/json",
		  url: "/api/naci/processdata/savedata",
		  beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', '${g_ck}'); },
		  data: param,
		  success: function(data){
		       window.location.reload(true); 
		  },
		  error: function(data){
				alert("ERROR");
	      }
		});
		closeWin();
	}
		
	function getProposalData(){
		var variables= {};
		var index = 0;
		for(index=0; index < names.length; index++) {
			if(textFields.indexOf(names[index]) > -1){
				var value = $('#'+names[index]).val();
				if(names[index].indexOf('Date') > 0){
					value = getConvertedValue(value, '0');
				}
		        variables[names[index]] = value;
			}else{
	            if($('#'+names[index]).is(':checked')){
				   variables[names[index]] = 'true';
				}else{
		           variables[names[index]] = 'false';
                } 		
			}
		}
		return [variables];
	}
		
	function getConvertedValue(value, flag){
	   if(!value || 0 == value.length){
		   return "";
		}
	   if(flag == '0'){
		  var values = value.split('/');
		  return values[0]+'-'+values[1] + '-' + values[2];
		}else {
		  var values = value.split('-');
		  return values[0]+'/'+values[1] + '/' + values[2];
		}
	}	
	
	function clearForm(){
		for(index=0; index < names.length; index++) {
			if(textFields.indexOf(names[index]) != -1 ){ 
				$('#'+names[index]).val('');
		    }else{
			   $('#'+names[index]).prop('checked', false); 
			}
		}
		$('#otherTaskValue').prop('disabled', true);
		$('#otherPlace').hide();
	}

	function showSubmitButton(){
		if(isDCEGPI()){
			$('#submitterSpan').show();
		}else{
			$('#submitterSpan').hide();
		}
	}
	</script>
	<br/>
	
	<div class="container" style="width:80%;">
	  <div class="row">
		 <img src="NCI-logo-full.jpg" height="70" Alt="NCI LOGO"/> <span style="float:right"> <input type="button" class="btn btn-default active" value="Logout" onclick="javascript:logout();"/>     </span>
	  </div>
	  <div style="white-space:nowrap; display:inline;" class="col-md-12">
	    	<h3 class="tools-owner-title">DCEG Bioinformatics Resource Requisition System</h3>
      </div>
	  <div class="col-md-12">  </div>
      <div class="col-md-12">
    		Bioinformatics Resource Oversight Panel reviews and prioritize proposals from DCEG investigators for use of the resource of the Bioinformatics Group within the NCI's Center for Bioinformatics and Information Technology(CBIIT).
    		BROP periodically assesse the quality and timeliness of CBIIT Bioinformatics Group support and also review and prioritize projects that propose to use high-performance computing (HPC) infrastructure at the Cancer Genomics Research (CGR)
    		laboratory. Specifically, the CCAD cluster.
    		<br/>
    		Investigators should consist of summary of the project with a clear description of the scope of work, timeline and deliverables.
    		<br/>
    		A Bioinformatics Resource Oversight Panel Form should be in place PRIOR to starting the research    <span id="submitterSpan"> <input type="button" name="submitForm" id="submitForm" class="btn btn-default active" value="Submit a Proposal" onclick="newProposal();"/></span>
			<br/>
      </div>
	 <div class="row"><br/></div>
	<div class="row col-md-12" >
	  <div ng-app="saveRequestTable">
		<div ng-controller="saveTableControl"  id="saved_table" style="display:none;">
    		<div class="panel panel-success" >
    			<div class="panel-heading" role="tab" id="heading_savedItems">
    				<h4 class="panel-title">
    					<a role="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#collapsesavedItems" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="collapsesavedItems">
    					<span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-minus-square"></i></span> Draft Proposals <span class="badge" id="ritm_count">{{count}}</span>
						</a>
    				</h4>
    			</div>
    			<div id="collapsesavedItems" class="panel-collapse collapse in" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="heading_savedItems">
    				<table  class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed">
						<tr>
							<th ng-click="sort('projectName')">Project Name<span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='projectName'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('name')">Principal Investigator<span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='name'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('createdOn')">Created Date<span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='createdOn'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th>Actions</th>
						</tr>
						<tr dir-paginate="data in myData|filter:search|orderBy:sortKey:reverse|itemsPerPage:pageSize" pagination-id="savedDataPagination"> 
    						<td class="ritm_number">{{data.projectName}}</td>
							<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.name}}</td>
    						<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.createdOn}}</td>
    						<td><button ng-click="listDetails(data.sysId);" class="btn btn-sm btn-default" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;"> Edit</button> 
    							<button ng-click="removeItem(data.sysId);" class="btn btn-sm btn-default" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">Delete</button>
    						</td>	
    					</tr>
    				</table>	
					<div>
						<table width="100%" border="0">
							<tr><td width="70%"><dir-pagination-controls pagination-id="savedDataPagination" direction-links="true" boundary-links="true"></dir-pagination-controls></td>
								<td width="25%" align="right"><label>Items per page  </label></td>
								<td width="5%" align="right">
									<select class="form-control" ng-model="pageSize" ng-init="pageSize='10'" style="width:80px;">
										<option value="5">5</option>
										<option value="10">10</option>
										<option value="15">15</option>
										<option value="20">20</option>
									</select>
								</td>
							</tr>
						</table>	
					</div>
				</div>
    		</div>		
    	</div>
		  
		<div ng-controller="secretaryViewControl" id="secretary_init_table" style="display:none;">
    		<div class="panel panel-success" >
    			<div class="panel-heading" role="tab" id="heading_secretaryViewItems">
    				<h4 class="panel-title">
    					<a role="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#collapseSecrettaryViewItems" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="collapseSecrettaryViewItems">
    					<span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-minus-square"></i> </span> Proposals Waiting for Executive Secretary Initial Quality Control Check <span class="badge" id="ritm_count"> {{count}}</span>
    					</a>
    				</h4>
    			</div>
    			<div id="collapseSecrettaryViewItems" class="panel-collapse collapse in" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="heading_secretaryViewItems">
    				<table  class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed">
						<tr>
							<th ng-click="sort('number')">BROP ID<span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='number'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('name')">Principal Investigator<span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='name'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('projectName')">Project Name<span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='projectName'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('submittedBy')">Submitted By<span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='submittedBy'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('submittedDate')">Submitted Date<span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='submittedDate'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th>Status</th>
							<th ng-click="sort('lastUpdateDate')">Last Update Date<span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='lastUpdateDate'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<!-- <th>Approval Date</th> -->
							<th>Actions</th>
						</tr>
						<tr dir-paginate="data in myData|filter:search|orderBy:sortKey:reverse|itemsPerPage:pageSize" pagination-id="secretaryViewDataPagination"> 
    						<td class="ritm_number">{{data.number}}</td>
						    <td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.name}}</td>
    						<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.projectName}}</td>
    						<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.submittedBy}}</td>
    						<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.submitDate}}</td>
    						<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.stage}}</td>
    						<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.lastUpdateDate}}</td>
    						<!-- <td class="ritm_cat_item">
								<img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Request Submitted"></img>
								<img src="/images//workflow_active.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Exective Secretary Approved"></img>
								<img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Wait For Full Committee Review"></img>
								<img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Wait for Executive Secretary Final Review"></img>
								<img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Wait for Chairman Review"></img>
								<img src="/images/workflow_pending.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Wait for Bioinformatician Review"></img>								
							</td> -->
							<td>
								<button ng-click="displayDetails(data.requestId, data.approvalId);" class="btn btn-sm btn-default" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;"> View</button> 
								<a href="report.do?sys_id={{data.requestId}}" target="_BLANK"><button class="btn btn-sm btn-default" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">Export</button></a> 
							</td>	
    					</tr>
    				</table>	
					<div>
						<table width="100%" border="0">
							<tr><td width="70%"><dir-pagination-controls pagination-id="secretaryViewDataPagination" direction-links="true" boundary-links="true"></dir-pagination-controls></td>
								<td width="25%" align="right"><label>Items per page  </label></td>
								<td width="5%" align="right">
									<select class="form-control" ng-model="pageSize" ng-init="pageSize='10'" style="width:80px;">
										<option value="5">5</option>
										<option value="10">10</option>
										<option value="15">15</option>
										<option value="20">20</option>
									</select>
								</td>
							</tr>
						</table>	
					</div>
				</div>

								<img ng-if="data.isFastTrack != 'yes'" src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Wait for Executive Secretary Approved"></img>
								<img ng-if="data.isFastTrack == 'yes'" src="/images/workflow_skipped.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Fast Track bypass Executive Secretary Final Review"></img>
								<img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Wait for Chairman Review"></img>
								<img src="/images/workflow_approved.gifx" Alt="Request Submitted" title="Wait for Bioinformatician Review"></img>								
							</td> -->
    						<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.submitDate}}</td>		
							<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.estimateHour}}</td>		
							<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.actualHour}}</td>		
							<td>
								<button ng-click="finish(data.sysId);" class="btn btn-sm btn-default" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;"> View</button> 
								<a href="report.do?sys_id={{data.sysId}}" target="_BLANK"><button class="btn btn-sm btn-default" style="width: 70px; text-align: center;">Export</button></a> 
							</td>	
    					</tr>
    				</table>	
					<div>
						<table width="100%" border="0">
							<tr><td width="70%"><dir-pagination-controls pagination-id="bioinformaticianCompleteViewDataPagination" direction-links="true" boundary-links="true"></dir-pagination-controls></td>
								<td width="25%" align="right"><label>Items per page  </label></td>
								<td width="5%" align="right">
									<select class="form-control" ng-model="pageSize" ng-init="pageSize='10'" style="width:80px;">
										<option value="5">5</option>
										<option value="10">10</option>
										<option value="15">15</option>
										<option value="20">20</option>
									</select>
								</td>
							</tr>
						</table>	
					</div>
				</div>
    		</div>		
    	</div>
		  
		<!--submitted proposal will be always last  -->
		<div ng-controller="piSubmittedControl" id="submitted_table" style="display:none">
    		<div class="panel panel-success" >
    			<div class="panel-heading" role="tab" id="heading_submittedItems">
    				<h4 class="panel-title">
    					<a role="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#collapsesubmittedItems" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="collapsesubmittedItems">
    					<span class="accordion_icon"><i class="fa fa-minus-square"></i></span> Submitted Proposals <span class="badge" id="ritm_count">{{count}}</span>
    					</a>
    				</h4>
    			</div>
    			<div id="collapsesubmittedItems" class="panel-collapse collapse in" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="heading_submittedItems">
    				<table  class="table table-bordered table-striped table-condensed">
						<tr>
							<th ng-click="sort('number')">BROP ID<span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='number'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('name')">Principal Investigator<span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='name'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('projectName')">Project Name<span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='projectName'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th ng-click="sort('stage')">Status<span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='stage'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<!-- <th>Approval</th> -->
							<th ng-click="sort('submitDate')">Submitted Date<span class="glyphicon sort-icon" ng-show="sortKey=='submitDate'" ng-class="{'glyphicon-chevron-up':reverse,'glyphicon-chevron-down':!reverse}"></span></th>
							<th>Actions</th>
						</tr>

    						<td class="ritm_cat_item">{{data.stage}}</td>

	</div>
	<div id="newProposal" class="modal fade" data-keyboard="false" data-backdrop="static">
		  <div class="modal-dialog modal-lg" style="width:1000px;">
				<div class="modal-content" style="overflow-y:auto; overflow-x: hidden;">
					  <div class="modal-header">
						  <button type="button" class="close btn btn-xs" data-dismiss="modal" aria-label="Close"><span aria-hidden="true">x</span></button>
						   <div id="anchor">
							 <font size="5"> <b>Bioinformatics Resource Oversight Panel (BROP) Proposal</b></font>
						   </div>
					  </div>
					  <div class="modal-body" width="70%">
						 <div class="container">
							 <div class="row">
								 <div class="col-md-10">
									 Once proposals have been received they will be evaluated and prioritized on the following criteria: Scientific importance, Feasibility of Timeline/workload. Status of Projects in queue. Is the request Collaborative or Methodologic. Is the request for generating new data or data that has been waiting to be processed.
								 </div>
							 </div>
							 <div class="col-md-12">  </div>
							 <div class="row">
								 <div class="col-md-10">
									 <div class="panel panel-default">
										<div class="panel-heading"><h2 class="panel-title">Proposal Information</h2></div>
										<div class="panel-body">
											<div class="row col-md-12" id="errorMessage" style="display:none;"></div>
											<div class="row">
												<label class="col-sm-8"><font color='red'>*</font>Name</label>
												<label class="col-sm-4"><font color='red'>*</font>CAS Study Code</label>
											</div>
											<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
												 <div class="col-sm-8"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="name"/></div>
												<div class="col-sm-4"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="casCode"/></div>
											</div>											
											<div class="row">
												<label class="col-sm-8"><font color='red'>*</font>Project Name</label>
												<label class="col-sm-4"><font color='red'>*</font>BRG Approval Number (if applicable)</label>
											</div>
											<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
												<div class="col-sm-8"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="projectName" /></div>
												<div class="col-sm-4"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="trcNumber"/></div>
											</div>
											<div class="row">
												<label class="col-sm-4">Need by Date</label>
												<label class="col-sm-8">Explanation</label>
											</div>
											<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
												<div class="col-sm-4"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="needDate"/></div>
												<div class="col-sm-8">
												<textarea id="explanation" class="form-control" rows="3" style="width:100%;" name="explanation" form="usrform" placeholder="Explain why need by this date"></textarea>
												</div>
											</div>
										</div>	
									 </div>	 
									<div class="panel panel-default">
										<div class="panel-heading"><h2 class="panel-title"><font color='red'>*</font>Description of Request</h2></div>
										<div class="panel-body">
											<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
												<div class="col-sm-12">
													<textarea id="requestDescription" rows="4" style="width:100%;margin-top:10px" name="comment" form="usrform" placeholder="Describe the project in a few brief paragrpahs including the background, description and hypothesis"></textarea>
												</div>
											</div>	
											<div class="panel panel-default">
												<div class="panel-heading"><h2 class="panel-title">Description of the scope of work being requested</h2></div>
												<div class="panel-body">
													<div class="row">
														<label class="col-sm-6"><font color='red'>*</font>Data Processing: Technology / Specific programs needed</label>
														<label class="col-sm-3"><font color='red'>*</font>Where will analysis be run</label>
														<label class="col-sm-3">  </label>
													</div>
													<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
														<div class="col-sm-6"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="technologyNeed" /></div>
														<div class="col-sm-3">
															<select id="whereRun" class="form-control" style="width:200;" onchange="valueChange();">
																<option value="biowulf">Biowulf</option>
																<option value="ccad">CCAD Cluster</option>
																<option value="cgems">CGEMS Cluster</option>
																<option value="unknown">Unknown</option>
																<option value="other">Other</option>
															</select>
														</div>
														<div class="col-sm-3"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="otherPlace" style="width:200; display:none;"/></div>
													</div>
												</div>
											</div>											
											<div class="panel panel-default">
												<div class="panel-heading"><h2 class="panel-title">Data Attributes</h2></div>
												<div class="panel-body">
													<div class="row">
														<label class="col-sm-4"><font color='red'>*</font>Where is the data currently stored</label>
														<label class="col-sm-4"><font color='red'>*</font>What is the physical size</label>
														<label class="col-sm-4"><font color='red'>*</font>Current format of data files(s)</label>
													</div>
													<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
														<div class="col-sm-4"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="whereStore" /></div>
														<div class="col-sm-4"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="size"  /></div>
														<div class="col-sm-4"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="fileFormat" /></div>
													</div>
													<div class="row">
														<label class="col-sm-12"><font color='red'>*</font>Concrete list of Deliverables (including any deadlines)</label>
													</div>
													<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
														<div class="col-sm-12"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="listDeliverables" /></div>
													</div>
														<div class="row">
														<label class="col-sm-12"><font color='red'>*</font>List Primary Collaborators</label>
													</div>
													<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
														<div class="col-sm-12"><input type="text" class="form-control" id="listCollaborators" /></div>
													</div>
												</div>
											</div>
										</div>											
									 </div> 	
									<div class="panel panel-default">
										<div class="panel-heading" id="err"><h2 class="panel-title"><font color='red'>*</font>Requested Bioinformatics Tasks</h2></div>
											<div class="panel-body">
												<div class="row">
													<label class="col-sm-6"><b>Description</b></label>
													<label class="col-sm-3"><b>Timeframe (in Hour)</b></label>
													<label class="col-sm-3"><b>Timeframe(in work-days)</b></label>
												</div>
												<div class="row" style="margin-bottom:10px">
